title: Hitting the Enter key in the Find/Replace dialog has no effect on Mac OS X
description:
When using Eclipse 3.0 M2 Build id: 200307181617 on Mac OS X 10.2.6, hitting the Enter key in the Find/Replace dialog does not perform a search operation. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Open the Find/Replace dialog by going to Edit -> Find/Replace.
2. Type in a search term into the text box.
3. Press the Enter key.

Expected Result: The Enter key should initiate a search operation, similar to clicking on the Find button which is highlighted as the default action in the dialog.

Actual Result: Nothing happens.
OB: Hitting the Enter key in the Find/Replace dialog should initiate a search operation on Mac OS X.
EB: The Enter key in the Find/Replace dialog does not perform a search operation on Mac OS X.
SR: Fix the Find/Replace dialog so that hitting the Enter key performs a search operation on Mac OS X.
